description: Counterstake Bridge Import Pooled Assistant AA.

field_descriptions.txid: ID of the expatriation transaction on the foreign chain.
field_descriptions.stake: Stake to send with the claim or challenge.
field_descriptions.txts: Timestamp of the expatriation transaction on the foreign chain.
field_descriptions.sender_address: Sender address on the foreign chain.
field_descriptions.data: Data to be forwarded to the recipient.
field_descriptions.stake_on: The outcome to add a stake on, 'yes' or 'no'.
field_descriptions.buy_shares: Buy shares in the pooled assistant, set to 1.
